string-array.name: array_quotes
string-array.item: Ethically, she couldn\'t cause the suffering of any living thing. Logically, bacon cheeseburgers were delicious.
Even apocalypse looks less dire when viewed over a plate of bacon.
Pigs might make great pets, but they make better breakfast. I’ll take one big snuggle, with a side of scrambled eggs.
They don\'t go in for the fancy or exotic, but stick to conventional food like flightless bird embryos, .
bacon, The source of all happiness
Love is the no noise in a bucket of sausage gravy. I would tell you how much you mean to me, but it’s more effective to show you,
We had a bacon love—even when it was bad, it was good. And crispy.
Life is too short not to order the bacon dessert.
